line: well my eye is a little itchy
you should go see my eye doctor
not gonna go see your ex boyfriend
that is all i ever hear richard richard richard
since we have been going out i think mentioned his name twice
it is this new guy and he is really good
well sorry not going to an eye doctor
anytime anything comes close to touching her eye or anyone elses she like freaks out
fine okay i have a weird thing about my eye
can we not talk about it please
hey rach remember that great song me myself and i
hey does anybody want to get some lunch
all those in favor say i
how much did i love the king and i
ohh give him a kiss for me
i am so sorry you got caught in the middle of that
i did not mean to be so out there
trying but man that guy can push my buttons
why are so mad at him
look i do not wanna talk about it
you wanna be on my list too
has anyone seem my list by the way
uh it is a piece of paper and it says ross on it
i just got off the phone with estelle and guess what
i got the lead in a movie
you got the lead in a movie
it is called shutter speed it is really cool
yeah umm i meet this girl in the subway and we fall in love in like a day right
and then she disappears but i find out where she lives and when i get there this like old lady answers the door and i say where is betsy
and she says betsys been dead for 10 years
and the best part is we are filming in the desert outside vegas
and you know what that means buddy
yeah i know that means buddy
yeah we can rent a car
i just have to be there by tuesday
well uh we can talk about that too pheebs
she probably will not be using it you can drive it to las vegas
whoa whoa whoa what are we going to do about my job
all right great road trip baby
you do not have to ask for my permission
we are gonna be late for the eye doctor appointment
let us get this over with
oh i mean look at this mess
i mean we are probably gonna have to clean this up
we are gonna have to reschedule
if you thought this mess is going to bother me you are wrong
all right let us go blinky
i cannot decide which route to take to vegas
hey you have traveled a lot right
okay so so which route should i take the northern route or the southern route
ooh if you take the northern route there is a man in illinois with a beard of bees
okay i must protest this lived in illinois all my life and know of no man with a beard of bees
wisconsin on the other hand might be a different story
but on the southern route there is a chicken that plays tic tac toe
oh i know a way that you can decide
all right going to ask you a series of questions and you answer as quickly as you can
okay all right here we go
now i want you to relax
which do you like better peanut butter or egg whites
which would you rather be a fireman or a swimmer
who would you rather sleep with monica or rachel
oh huh i always thought it would be rachel
beard of bees here i come
you guys want to see a movie tonight
sure what do you want to see
oh i know how we can decide
but hey i know we can decide
okay gonna ask you questions and you answer real quick
what do you like better action or comedy
who would you rather sleep with monica or rachel
i forgot you had that whole rachel thing
oh that is an eye removal machine
monica told me you were a little nervous but do not worry everythings gonna be just fine
now you will feel a small puff of air in each eye
a small puff of air now come on
all right just stay in here this time
yknow what gonna hold her head
you are young you probably do not have glaucoma
it was very very nice to meet you sir ow
you have got a small minor infection in that left eye
i want you to take these drops three times a day and you will be as good as new
yeah no i do not i do not put things in my eye
okay then i guess we will see you back here in three months
and fit you for a glass eye
okay just give me the damn drops
and you do not get one
yknow i i gotta tell ya those eye drops are a miracle
they are still in my coat
yeah listen how cold is it going to be there
do i need a coat or will all these sweater vests be enough
man i wish ross was coming with us
i just got that jerk out of my mind
hey so where are we staying
is the movie putting us up in a big hotel suite
it is an independent film yknow
so we do not have a real big budget
i figured just stay in your room
i see but once you get your first paycheck you will be springing a big hotel suite right
i mean lead in a movie they must be paying you a lot
for every dollar shutter speed makes one penny of it goes right in joeys pocket
so you do not get paid unless the movie makes money
did you not hear the plot of the movie
she is been dead for ten years
i just wanna say good bye to you guys and to see if you guys will place a little bet for me huh
i wanna say good bye at the car
anybody want to say good bye to me at the car
oh honey say good bye to you at the car if you do not mind the puss
i did not see you there
phoebe are you are you mad at me or something
because if are please tell me what it is i did
well if you do not know i cannot help you
well whatever it is very very sorry
so we are we are good
will you please tell me what it is i did that mad you so mad at me
well if you cannot remember cannot we just forget about this
oh no i am mad at you
but i am sorry about the fat ass thing
you actually have a very sweet little hiney
you are might have to take over soon
we have been driving for a half hour and you have not looked at the road once
do not worry it is out there
i think i just need lunch
ooh hey i know how we can decide
all right uh gonna ask you a bunch of questions and then you have to answer real fast
so uh clear your mind clear it right out
okay uhh would you rather be too wet or too dry
do you believe in ghosts yes or no
is this movie gonna be my big break
you do not think this is going to be a big break for me
look joe i just i just do not want to get your hopes up real high
they are not even paying ya
this does not even sound like a real movie
i do not know why you are dumping all over my big break
joe i do not think this is going to be your big break
is that why you are on this trip huh
make me feel like a loser
because if it is tell ya i i rather be alone
oh you do not want me on the trip
not if you are gonna be like this
all right tell ya what the next time you ask me a question like that lie
i do not want you on the trip
why do not you pull over
you are not actually supposed to stop on the bridge
okay are you mad at me because my hair gel smells
are you angry at me because i said your handwriting is childlike
no that made me feel precious
umm is it because he is always correcting peoples grammar
oh did you beat him at a board game
he turns into such a baby when he starts to lose
joey kicked me out of the car on the george washington bridge
yknow we were playing that game where you you ask a question and you answer it really fast
that game should not be played without my supervision
well i do not know what mad him so mad yknow

all i said was that uh i did not think this was not gonna be his big break that this movie was not going to do anything for him and that uh yknow it did not sound like a real movie okay he should have pushed me off of the bridge
oh i figured you guys would all be mad at me
so i got you some gifts that i found on the side of the road
who wants the teddy bear with one leg
how many fingers am i holding up
oh my god i was thinking four
why do not we start with a practice run
well well you said it was practice
because i knew you were lying
i am going going turn it over
i am going to get these drops in your eyes
wow yknow if joey and chandler walked in right now we could make a fortune
ooh that is definitely chandler joey or ross
yknow he is really upset about it
not as upset as he is gonna be when he finds out what i did with his sweater vests
what did you do to his sweater vests
let us just say there is a well dressed pack of dogs in ohio
hey monica listen is is phoebe there
i gotta ask her something about the car
listen this wooden box keeps sliding out from under the seat
and thanks joey she is having a really great time
chandlers here he was wondering okay i guess he ran out of change
yknow he will not even talk to me
how am i going to apologize to him if he will not even talk to me
well maybe you should send him something
so that when he gets to las vegas he will know that you are sorry
i wonder where i could get a basket of p0rn
no do not do not say sorry with p0rn
yknow what you should send him
because that why he could trade it for protection
okay pheebs i know how we are going to figure this out
okay clear your mind and answer the first thing that comes into your head
what do you like better flora or fauna
who would you rather be simon or garfunkle
why are you mad at me
you said i was boring ohh
when did i say you were boring
oh my god i remember now
you and i have never played chess
yes remember that time on the frozen lake
we were playing chess you said i was boring and then you took off your energy mask and you were cameron diaz
okay there is a chance this may have been a dream
you are leading man is here
it is a money thing we do not have any
it it is probably just temporary
we are hoping to get some more money soon so if could just uh hang out
people will always wanna invest in movies
hey you are not rich are ya
look joey let me know where you are staying okay
hey pal are you joey tribbiani
aww you remembered even though you are a big star
it will be years before i forget you
joey what is it like on a movie set huh
do you have a dressing room
do you have a chair with your name on it
uh well yeah yeah got all of that going on
yeah listen uh i want you to make sure you tell chandler that he could not have been more wrong
i gotta go monica my uh my sushis here
we hope it is toga rrific
hey rach can you pass me the tv guide
we will see you in about 3 to 4 hours
